format.description: Format the countdown display, refer to [dayjs](https://day.js.org/)
format.description_zh: 格式化倒计时展示，参考 [dayjs](https://day.js.org/)

:prefix.description: Set the prefix of the numeric value

:suffix.description: Set the suffix of the numeric value

:title.description: The title of the numeric value

:valueStyle.description: Sets the style of the numeric range

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

events.name: onFinish
events.description: Triggers when the countdown is complete

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when the countdown time changes
events.description_zh: 倒计时时间变化时触发
